an3.137:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yani kanici tantavutanam vatthanam, kesakambalo tesam patikittho akkhayati.
an3.137:1.2: Kesakambalo, bhikkhave, site sito, unhe unho, dubbanno, duggandho, dukkhasamphasso.
an3.137:1.3: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yani kanici puthusamanabrahmanavadanam makkhalivado tesam patikittho akkhayati.
an3.137:2.3: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesum atitamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, tepi bhagavanto kammavada ceva ahesum kiriyavada ca viriyavada ca.
an3.137:2.6: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anagatamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha, tepi bhagavanto kammavada ceva bhavissanti kiriyavada ca viriyavada ca.
an3.137:2.9: Ahampi, bhikkhave, etarahi araham sammasambuddho kammavado ceva kiriyavado ca viriyavado ca.
an3.137:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, nadimukhe khippam uddeyya bahunam macchanam ahitaya dukkhaya anayaya byasanaya;
an3.137:3.2: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippam manne loke uppanno bahunam sattanam ahitaya dukkhaya anayaya byasanaya”ti.
